lines.text: I don't have a girl in Prague. I don't have a girl in Prague.

[to Milda's mother, after Andula arrives unannounced]
Haven't I always said your son is nuts? Here's your proof.

[naked, reluctant to have sex with Milda]
But I don't trust you.
[a short time later, while having sex with Milda]
I do trust you. I've never trusted anyone so much before.

[after Andula gently kicks him in the shin]
You know, I could get gangrene and die.
[Late at night, Andula arrives to Prague. Milda isn't home]
He didn't say where he was going or when he'd be back.
You should maybe try and find him on your own.
